    • create

      public BankAccount create()
      Create a new empty BankAccount and insert it into the database and the appropriate hashmap.
      Returns:
      BankAccount representation of the account that was inserted into the database.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - for any database errors encountered.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(BankAccount account)
      Deletes the referenced account from the in-memory representation and marks it as deleted in the database.
      Parameters:
      account - BankAccount to be marked as deleted
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, and false otherwise.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(int accountID)
      Deletes the referenced account from the in-memory representation and marks it as deleted in the database. NOTE: this method does not remove the item from its container in the in-memory representation.
      Parameters:
      accountID - ID of the account to be marked as deleted
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, and false otherwise.

    • modifyBalance

      public boolean modifyBalance(BankAccount account, double amount)

    • modifyBalance

      public boolean modifyBalance(int accountID, double amount)
      Adds the specified (possibly negative) amount to the specified account's balance and records a transaction for it
      Parameters:
      accountID - ID of the account to modify
      amount - Amount (positive or negative) to adjust the account balance by
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise (such as if the account has insufficient funds to add the (negative) amount).

    • transfer

      public boolean transfer(BankAccount source, BankAccount target, double amount)
      Move the indicated amount from the source account to the target account
      Parameters:
      source - account credits are moving from
      target - account credits are moving to
      amount - number of credits to move
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise (such as DB error or insufficient funds)

    • transfer

      public boolean transfer(int sourceAccountID, int targetAccountID, double amount)
      Move the indicated amount from the source account to the target account
      Parameters:
      sourceAccountID - ID of the account credits are moving from
      targetAccountID - ID of the account credits are moving to
      amount - number of credits to move
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise (such as DB error or insufficient funds)

    • getTransactions

      public Collection<AccountTransferHistoryRecord> getTransactions(BankAccount account)
      Provides a history of all changes to the supplied account
      Parameters:
      account - The account to find history for
      Returns:
      Vector of AccountTransferHistoryRecords that indicate a modification of this account

    • getTransactions

      public Collection<AccountTransferHistoryRecord> getTransactions(int accountID)
      Provides a history of all changes to the supplied account
      Parameters:
      accountID - of the account
      Returns:
      Vector of AccountTransferHistoryRecords that indicate a modification of this account

    • refresh

      public void refresh(BulletZoneData bzData)
      Reads the database and fills the HashMaps as appropriate. Intended to be called once at time of initialization.
      Parameters:
      bzData - reference to BulletZoneData class to use for SQL queries
